title: UN chief warns of  rathole of retaliation  after U . S . strikes on Iran | Central India Premier English Daily
description: United Nations, June 23 (UNI) UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on Sunday warned of "a rathole of retaliation" in the wake of U.S. strikes on Iranian nuclear sites. The U.S. bombing of Iranian nuclear facilities marks a perilous turn in a region that is already reeling, Guterres told an emergency meeting of the UN Security Council.
